  • Uses of EnvelopeException in i5.las2peer.api.persistency

    Subclasses of EnvelopeException in i5.las2peer.api.persistency 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  EnvelopeAccessDeniedException
    This exception is thrown if an artifact cannot be opened.
    class  EnvelopeAlreadyExistsException
    This exception is thrown if an envelope already exists in the networks DHT.
    class  EnvelopeNotFoundException
    This exception is thrown if an artifact was not found in the networks DHT.
    class  EnvelopeOperationFailedException
    This exception is thrown if an storage operation fails.
